1524280296_16CWdkXYYRnpct8GYS7GgD6yFcJHP.body: https://akasha.world/ is very interesting. It's beta and still has many performance issues. But is't gorgeous, has a co-founder of Ethereum in the lead, and it's experimenting with a tokenized incentive and reputation system. Leverages ipfs and the Ethereum blockchain. So much to be hopeful about.
